column2: You are not starting with any of the special Dark World campaign options.
You've always been troubled by dark dreams. Now, as you've ascended to your place on the throne, your dream becomes more.
You have chosen to NOT include this content in your game.
You have chosen to include content such as Futanari and Traps in your game.
Dark World Heaven and Hell Content
You have chosen to include adult content that has Succubi, Incubi, and Angels.
You have chosen to include adult content that has Werebeasts and Vampires.
You have chosen to include adult content that has Elves, Orcs, and Fairies.
You have chosen to include adult content that has Neko and Kitsune.
Do not start with any bonus traits. NOTE: Campaign starts give certain traits, so be careful not to select the same traits.
This will enable you to start the game with an Intrigue Decision which will allow you to be a Futa or Trap.
Fenris, the Ancient Werewolf, has decided it is time for a new age. One which you will help lead.
A werewolf joined your court and has established dominance over you. (Werewolf Bitch or Omega Male)
The Neko bloodline, from your great grandmother, awakens within you.
You were fed upon and awoke a vampire without a master.
You have chosen to include adult content that has tentacles and Tentacle-kin.
You're an Orc who crossed the veil and find yourself in a land of humans, who are ripe for conquering.
The era of elves is considered to be long over, yet no one said you had to go without a fight.
You're a rare Kitsune, who's lineage was almost destroyed by an unknown beast.
A voice from God speaks to you. You are his will, his instrument in salvation.
Your mother was raped by a tentacle beast, and you're the resulting spawn.
You have chosen to include content that involves sex with animals.
